message: I'm feeling generous, Alice.  Take it or leave it.
Come on, Bob. You're losing value each round. Be smart!
This is my last offer, Alice. Let's end this and both go home happy.
You said that was your last offer, but I'm still here. Time to concede?
Alice, it seems we both overestimated our bargaining positions. This is the best I can offer at this point.
